Title: Run!
Plot: Matt enters the private security business and receives an objectionable client. Suresh finds another person on the list. As her home-life worsens, Claire strives to learn more about her birth parents. Hiro and Ando get sidetracked in Vegas again while searching for the sword. Nathan is forced to deal with a secret from his past. Still indebted to Mr. Linderman, Jessica resorts to unsavory methods that could spell doom for a fellow hero.
GuestStars: Bill Fagerbakke, Jeremy Gram Weaver, John Lacy, Paul Perri, Jessalyn Gilsig, Kevin Chamberlin, Missi Pyle, Ethan Cohn
